name: ParkerWhite Brand Interactive
overview:
ParkerWhite Brand Interactive is a branding and digital communications agency. we are results-oriented branding and marketing company with 20 years of experience. We have led many fortune 1000 companies through corporate marketing, product management, strategic planning, sales, and business development within the highly competitive medical, fitness and healthy lifestyle industries.

ParkerWhite has proven our ability to motivate, energize, and lead corporate cross-functional teams to achieve successful results in fast paced environments. our team is highly articulate with excellent interpersonal, communication, and presentation skills across all levels including executives, employees, and partners.

From logos to corporate launch, website design to digital push, we make your brand have an emotinal connection. Itâ€™s about finding those ideas and avenues to create a positive reaction in the way people interact and connect with your brand. And by building brands with sustainability, we give brands life.
